description:
A Valparaiso Law Firm Committed To The Success Of Clients

Langer & Langer provides legal representation to the individuals and families in Valparaiso and others throughout Indiana. When confronting the physical, financial and emotional challenges of a divorce, accident injury, medical malpractice issues or an arrest, you and your family want compassionate representation from attorneys who will place your interests at the forefront of their methods.

With more than 100 years of combined experience, the team at Langer & Langer provides more than just representation and advice concerning the law — our ties to the local community run deep as we strive to help our clients resolve their immediate legal issues and plan for a better tomorrow. Whether pursuing just compensation from the insurance companies after a car accident or holding negligent parties accountable in matters of medical malpractice, we take the time to understand your needs and goals before offering advice or implementing a strategy.

Langer & Langer: Committed And Compassionate Legal Representation

As a general practice firm, we can assist with nearly any legal issue. Below are some of the most common types of cases we assist with:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Criminal defense
  • Personal injury
  • Wrongful death
  • Uninsured and underinsured motorist claims
  • Divorce, child custody, child support and other family law issues
  • Landlord, tenant and other real estate issues

To schedule a consultation with our lawyers, contact our Valparaiso law office.
